I dont think i know what to do...ahh. I really really dont. I mean, i can go on and on and on about stuff, soo much goes on here but i feel like when i write it out, it sounds like some big sob story or something.I dont want my journal entries to turn into like a book of a cry for help. Yesterday i came home from school and got literally attacked by my parents. I hads no clue what-so-ever what the hell was going on and i walk in the door to be left speechless. My little brother did somthing and my parents like drilled me about it and i didnt know what it even was. They want to tell me how much i disrespect them all the time, and how i dont love them, and whatever else comes into my moms fucking mind...well i think i have a right to think what i think about them, and feel how i feel. They arent exactly the best parents towards us. Half the stuff they do or have they hide from us because of some odd reason..well wtf. So yeah my mom was like yelling at me and bringing up all this shit that has by far passed already,and saying how much me and my sisters and brothers make her life so hard, and how she "fucking hates us kids for the things we do to her"..well none of us asked to be brought here. And half the time she makes me feel like i should just leave here, because she obviously wants nothing to do with me. She thinks we put her through so much and she is SUCH a hypocrit for saying that. She wasnt exactly the best mom towards us, i mean if she thinks leaving us when we were kids with my dad while she goes and falls in love with my step dad (not that i dont love him)is being a good mom..i dont even know. I spent more than half of last night in my room crying because of everything she said to me and then she tells me to fold laundry. Isnt it bad enough for her to see how much pain she like puts me through so often with the thingds she says.. and then she wants me to FOLD laundry! fucking crazy. She has the nerve to ask me whats wrong to top it off. I coudlnt tell her what goiing through my mind..i just said eveyrthing. Which it basically is everything because nothing lately is good for me..
